name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-basic-angular
description: Basic MCP App Server example using Angular

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-get-time.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-echo-text.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-calculate-stats.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-generate-color-palette.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-hrb-welcome.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && bun build server.ts --outdir dist --target node && bun build main.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node --external "./server.js" --banner "#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.watch: concurrently "cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-get-time.html vite build --watch" "cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-echo-text.html vite build --watch" "cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-calculate-stats.html vite build --watch" "cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-generate-color-palette.html vite build --watch" "cross-env INPUT=mcp-app-hrb-welcome.html vite build --watch"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve"
